title: 16B.054 DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES.
text: The Department of Administration is designated as the responsible agency to assist the Minnesota Governor's Council on Developmental Disabilities in carrying out all responsibilities under the Developmental Disabilities Assistance and Bill of Rights Act of 2000, also known as United States Code, title 42, sections 15001 to 15115, and Public Law 106-402 (October 30, 2000, 106th Congress), as well as those responsibilities relating to the program which are not delegated to the council. Public members of the council shall be compensated and reimbursed for expenses as provided in section 15.059, subdivision 3.
